cause.description:
There are a few things that are coming up I know I and others will need many strong and positive prayers. I also know that I personally need to get back on the path of praying and meditating.
This is more of a group thing, but the cause is going to be for each individual person, as well as us a whole. We all need to take a little time each day, quite the mind and the heart and listen to what is going on in our heart. Listen for God, because there is a lot being told to you. It doesn't matter what religion or beliefs you may have. I firmly believe that when more than one person prays for another, or a cause, it becomes more powerful.
I hope you join me in this group and cause.
Be well.
Christopher Pelletier
1. Pray and meditate daily.
2. "Where two or more join, there I will be."
cause.name: Prayer Requests
